title: Jatiluhung
author: Jatiluhung
content: maybe I will decide to move completely to the country I live in to work now. somehow it's much more comfortable here. have many friends here. and going back and forth between countries is very tiring. then after a few more years. i hope i can get citizenship where i work now.(finding someone special here. has changed my life to be more beautiful).will my family allow? oh I hope.

comments.author: VKcams.com
comments.body: Why do you need citizenship? Don't you need a residence permit to be happy?
